name: Sigil Covered Gloves
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely fast.
